title: AWS GPU Instance Types
description: GPU instance types available on AWS
markdownEnumDescriptions: `mem2_ssd1_gpu_x16`: 16 cores, 64 GiB RAM, 225 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA T4 GPU (16 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu_x32`: 32 cores, 128 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA T4 GPU (16 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu_x48`: 48 cores, 192 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 4 NVIDIA T4 GPUs (64 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu_x64`: 64 cores, 256 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA T4 GPU (16 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu1_x32`: 32 cores, 128 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA T4 GPU (16 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu1_x64`: 64 cores, 256 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA T4 GPU (16 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd1_gpu4_x48`: 48 cores, 192 GiB RAM, 900 GB storage, 4 NVIDIA T4 GPUs (64 GiB VRAM)
`mem2_ssd2_gpu1_v2_x16`: 16 cores, 64 GiB RAM, 600 GB storage, 1 NVIDIA L4 GPU (24 GiB VRAM)
